Assil Diab (اصيل دياب) bụ onye Sudanese na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-ese eserese na onye odee, nke bi na United States
O wee soro ndị mụrụ ya kwaga Qatar mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Assil gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Virginia Commonwealth University (VCU) na 2011 na Richmond, Virginia na USA ebe o nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts Degree na Graphics Design.
N'afọ 2021, ọ natara onyinye 10 Under 10 ma bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka otu n'ime ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na VCU10 kachasị elu n'ime afọ iri gara aga maka ihe ndị ọ rụzuru n'ọrụ ya na obodo.

Kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na onye na-ede ihe osise, na-emepụta akara ngosi na akara maka ụlọ ọrụ yana inye ya ọrụ ise mgbidi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, kọfị, ụlọ ahịa na azụmaahịa.
N'afọ 2020, o ritere ihe nrite mgbasa ozi site na UNESCO na i4policy maka mkpọsa nka n'okporo ámá nke ọ malitere na coronavirus na Sudan
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya ọdịbendị a na-asọpụrụ na Qatar Museums kemgbe 2018 ruo taa
Na mgbakwunye na ihe osise na mgbidi Sudan na Qatar, egosila ihe osise Assil na Bahrain, Germany, Bangladesh, na USA
E bipụtakwala ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ, nke gụnyere Artisans of the Middle East na China.
N'afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri Khartoum ma bụrụ onye a maara maka ihe osise ya na-asọpụrụ ụmụ amaala Sudan, ndị e gburu n'oge mgbanwe Sudan.
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Qatar

Ọ gara Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth na Qatar na Richmond, Virginia, USA, wee gụsịa akwụkwọ na 2011 na Bachelor of Fine Arts na eserese eserese. O nwekwara diplọma na Digital Marketing na Advanced Social Media Marketing.
Diab na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise n'onwe ya na onye na-ede ihe osise
A na-akpọ ya nwanyị mbụ na-ese ihe na Qatar na Sudan. Tupu ọ banye n'ọrụ onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese , ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Doha Film Institute (DFI) na Al Jazeera Children's Channel.
N'afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri Sudan, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ nka iji sọpụrụ ụmụ amaala Sudan na-eme ngagharị iwe, ndị nwụrụ n'oge mgbanwe Sudan
Maka ọrụ a, o mepụtara mgbidi nke ndị ahụ nwụrụ na mgbidi nke ụlọ ezinụlọ ha.
